title: In adults which is typically true of REM sleep

content.prompt: In adult humans, which of the following is typically true of REM sleep?

choices.label: It alternates with NREM sleep in 30-minute cycles.
It occurs during the first half of an individualâ€™s sleep cycle.
It involves decreased blood pressure and heart rate.
